features.name: User Authentication System
features.description: Complete user registration, login, logout, and session management with localStorage persistence. Includes profile management and user preferences.

features.name: AI Crypto Trading Chat
features.description: Interactive AI chatbot powered by Gemini API that provides crypto trading advice, market analysis, and personalized recommendations based on real-time market data.

features.name: Real-Time Market Data Ticker
features.description: Live cryptocurrency price ticker showing BTC, ETH, and SOL prices with 24h changes. Uses Binance WebSocket and REST API with fallback mechanisms.

features.name: Portfolio Tracker
features.description: User portfolio management system to track crypto holdings, calculate P&L, display current values, and manage multiple cryptocurrency positions.

features.name: Price Alerts System
features.description: Cryptocurrency price alert functionality allowing users to set custom price thresholds and get notified when prices hit targets.

features.name: Interactive Charts
features.description: Dynamic cryptocurrency price charts using Chart.js with multiple timeframes, historical data visualization, and technical indicators.

features.name: Trading Strategy Backtesting
features.description: Backtesting engine for testing trading strategies (RSI, MACD, EMA, Bollinger Bands) against historical data with performance metrics and trade history.

features.name: Market Sentiment Analysis
features.description: Sentiment analysis dashboard showing market mood and confidence levels for crypto assets.

features.name: Voice Commands
features.description: Voice recognition system for hands-free interaction with the crypto trading assistant.

features.name: Theme Switcher
features.description: Dark/light theme toggle with persistent user preference storage.

features.name: Profile Settings
features.description: User profile management with trading preferences, risk tolerance, experience level, currency preferences, and API key configuration.

features.name: Chat History Management
features.description: Persistent chat history storage with typewriter effect, markdown formatting, and conversation memory system.

features.name: Quick Action Buttons
features.description: Predefined quick action buttons for common queries and analysis requests.

features.name: Performance Optimizations
features.description: GPU acceleration, requestAnimationFrame throttling, passive event listeners, and CSS optimizations for 120fps UI performance.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Mobile-responsive layout with adaptive components and touch-friendly interactions.
